item.description: Welcome Screen App - Year View App - Month View Add/Edit Event Working Prototype View original iOS app →

item.title: Waltz Vineyards
item.description: The site was designed in Figma, and built from the ground up in Wordpress. They use a third party for their online shopping cart, so I worked with their team to implement new design changes.

item.title: Project Management
item.description: User Dashboard Prospects Edit/Add Prospect Convert Prospect to Project Project Items User Tasks Create Report View Report Style Guide Designed in Sketch.

item.title: Dev Stats Dashboard
item.description: Designed in Sketch, developed prototype in HTML.

item.title: Resum√©
item.description: Hello, I’m Drew. I am a self-taught front-end designer from the Philadelphia/Central Pennsylvania area. After going to school for teaching technology, and a short stint in the public school system, I pursued design, which was a passion of mine since I was younger. Since then I’ve been priveleged with a variety of design & developement opportunities from marketing agency to e-commerce for 5+ years. I love Jesus, my incredibly beautiful wife Bethany, drums, tennis, well-designed technology, and black coffee.

item.title: Success!
item.description: Your message has been sent! I'll be in touch as soon as possible. Thanks again for reaching out. :)

item.title: About
item.description: Hello, I’m Drew. I am a self-taught front-end designer from the Philadelphia/Central Pennsylvania area. After going to school for teaching technology, and a short stint in the public school system, I pursued design, which was a passion of mine since I was younger. Since then I’ve been priveleged with a variety of design & developement opportunities from marketing agency to e-commerce for 5+ years. I love Jesus, my incredibly beautiful wife Bethany, drums, tennis, well-designed technology, and black coffee.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Hello there! If you’d like to get in touch with me, feel free to shoot an email to me at hello@drewkramer.co.
